front.title: Evaluation of ADMDs and Integration aspects with respect to the R&D messaging community

abstract.t: This report seeks to provide an evaluation of commercial e-mail service providers (or ADMDs as they are called throughout this report) for the R&D community. It also, o brings together, into one document, information and facts about the global R&D messaging community that would be useful for ADMDs wishing to improve their connectivity to this community. o identifies problems in the current situation as regards messaging interconnections between ADMDs and the R&D community. And proposes some initial recommendations for solving these problems.
